name: Add a new row to a Google Sheets spreadsheetÂ from a new project event in QuickCapture
description:
Every time a new event appears in your project in QuickCapture, a new row will be created in a Google Sheet spreadsheet.

The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1T0H8fEKZxDexPIG7PumEEiCj0HCnBu9Zc8mbdEJU8Ps/edit?usp=sharing).
